name: Corona Calamity (beta)
description:
The year 2020 will forever be remembered due to the Coronavirus pandemic, with this virus rapidly spreading all over the entire world. 2020 will also be forever remembered because of the release of "Corona Calamity" a game where you can play through different scenarios of a world during pandemic.

The cure for Coronavirus has been found! But now the world is inundated with those infected. Play as a with a doctor with a ****load of syringes and chuck them at ill people to cure them. Do this before time runs out, or you'll become infected yourself! Curing people yields DNA Points which can be used to purchase upgrades in order to further heal people. The world is counting on you!

There are a few very important basic hygiene rules to follow in order to help prevent the spread of Coronavirus. One of those rules is coughing; cover all coughs. In this scenario, you and an online player both desperately need to cough, but you're in a public place! Hang on for as long as possible, because whoever coughs first, loses.
